评论详情: I am absolutely thrilled with the Real Essentials 5-Pack Women's Dry Fit Tech Stretch Short-Sleeve Crew Neck shirts!  These shirts are a game-changer for anyone looking for a blend of comfort, versatility, and affordability. The fabric is soft, lightweight, and breathable, making it perfect for everything from intense workouts to casual outings. The moisture-wicking technology keeps me dry, even during the sweatiest gym sessions.  The fit is just right—not too tight or too loose—providing a flattering silhouette without restricting movement. I love the vibrant assortment of colors in the pack, which makes it easy to mix and match with my wardrobe. They also hold up beautifully after multiple washes without fading or shrinking.  Whether you're hitting the gym, running errands, or lounging at home, these shirts are a must-have. I can't recommend them enough—excellent quality at an unbeatable price!  Will definitely be purchasing again!

类型: Special Size: Regular SizeSize: X-LargeColor: Set 4
评论详情: Ordered Color Set 4.  Overall, the quality was decent and the colors were as pictured.  Sizing runs a little on the small side.  I usually wear a L or XL and needed the XL so if you're in between sizes I would suggest ordering up a size.  For reference, I'm 5'6" and about 180 lbs, hourglass shape.I would have given this product a 4-star rating but there was an issue with one of the shirts.  The gray shirt in the set was a different size (2XL) than the other shirts.  I did not notice until I had already worn the teal and pink shirts and washed them so I couldn't return the pack.  I reordered the shirts in the same color set hoping to swap out the mis-sized shirt and do a return but once again the gray shirt was a 2XL.  Check all of the sizes before wearing/washing or you may be paying for 5 shirts while only getting 4 you can wear.
